subject: Lacrosse
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: After an uncertain start to the season, Conor Kelly, the Fighting Irish’s goalie, has made 37 saves in his past three games. In the N.C.A.A. men’s final against the Blue Devils in Baltimore on Monday, he will face an offensive juggernaut.
